attributes.action: Hold a full public inquiry into the arrest of Damian Green MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister to hold a full public inquiry into the arrest of MP Damian Green to determine who authorised both the arrest and gave permission for police officers to enter the House

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
